plot: In the season finale, Daredevil is backed into the ultimate showdown for his own life - and the future of Hell's Kitchen.

Foggy gets recruited by Jessica Jones' boss. Matthew and Elektra go after Nobu together, followed closely by Stick. The Hand gather up all the persons saved by Matthew in order to get to him. Karen reports her story, the one Frank tries so desperately to get away from.—Andreea D
